data.title: Materialise Software
data.meta_description: Materialise Software | 3,361 followers on LinkedIn. Materialise Software provides a platform of high-quality software tools which enables customers to manage and control their 3D printing process more efficiently. From data preparation and design optimization to control and management systems, our open and flexible solutions provide a solid foundation for players across the 3D printing industry and manufacturing eco-system. For additional information, please visit: http://www.materialise.com/en/software.
data.text:
❓ Did you know that one of the most powerful yet often underutilized benefits of 3D printing is the extensive data you can access with the right tools? 📊🔍 🚀 Elevate Your 3D Printing Operations with HP 3D Printing and Materialise 🚀 🔧 Introducing Materialise CO-AM: A cutting-edge platform designed to: - Automate your HP MJF and Metal Jet workflows 🤖 - Streamline collaboration across departments 🧩 - Unlock valuable insights to stay ahead of the competition 🏆 🌟 Why is this important? With Materialise CO-AM, you can: - Optimize productivity ⚙️ - Enhance decision-making 💡 - Accelerate innovation 🚀 💡 Why partner with us? HP 3D Printing and Materialise are here to help you capitalize on these insights, driving business growth and elevating you above the competition. 👉 Ready to unlock the full potential of your 3D printing operations? Partner with us today and harness the power of data-driven additive manufacturing! 🌐 🔗Find out more here: https://lnkd.in/dyieA667 #DataDriven #Innovation #BusinessGrowth #HP #Materialise #3DPrinting #AdditiveManufacturing #Innovation #Materialise #HP3DPrinting #3DbyHP #manufacturepossibilities #HPMultiJetFusion #HPMJF #HPMetalJet #additivemanufacturing #digitalmanufacturing #digitaltransformation

We’re celebrating a sweet accomplishment! We're thrilled to announce that our software business unit has achieved ISO 27001 certification, a global benchmark for information security management. 🌍🔒 This marks a significant milestone in our commitment to maintaining the highest standards of data security for our customers. To celebrate, our team enjoyed a massive treat of 27,001 M&Ms, representing not just the certification number but also the collaboration between various teams across the globe that made this possible. 🎉🤝 #ISO27001 #DataSecurity

Jan Van Espen, AM Quality & Process Control Manager at Materialise, studied aerospace engineering and has gradually evolved into an expert in AM process certification for the aircraft and medical industry. Jan led the process consulting team at Materialise to assist external customers in their AM process optimization. In 2014, he joined the medical BU for managing the NPI process, including process qualification for AM implant production, which concluded in 2017 with FDA approval for their in-house 3D printed titanium implants. Since 2020, he has acted as a process consultant for Materialise's strategic partners to leverage their AM process qualification/production processes based on his in-depth expertise. He also manages a team that investigates & develops AI tools for AM data. At our event next week Jan will give a presentation on Accelerating the NPI Process in the Aerospace Industry. Register for free now: https://lnkd.in/e7MZfKuQ #3DPrinting #AMAdvantage #FIA2024 #PAS2025 #AMAA

Exciting news for the additive manufacturing community! We're thrilled to announce that we've launched an Early Access Program with nTop, allowing organizations to benefit from our native nTop integrations with Magics. This integration is a game-changer for our customers, as it allows them to seamlessly import and 3D print implicit files directly from nTop. No more time-consuming meshing and slicing processes - the workflow is now streamlined and efficient. A great example is Wärtsilä, a global leader in innovative technologies and lifecycle solutions for the marine and energy markets. They were able to redesign a massive engine cylinder head, reducing weight and consolidating multiple parts. However, the bottleneck was meshing the complex geometry. With the new nTop-Magics integration, Wärtsilä was able to export the part in seconds, open it in Magics in minutes, and have it sliced and ready for printing on their Nikon SLM NXG XII 600 3D printers in just a couple of hours. This level of speed and efficiency is a game-changer, empowering manufacturers to unlock the full potential of additive manufacturing. We're excited to see how our customers leverage this integration to drive innovation and boost their ROI. Apply to join the Early Access Program: https://mtls.am/4eNEJUZ #AdditiveManufacturing #DigitalTransformation #nTopology #Magics #ntopComputationalDesignSummit #RapidTCT

🌟 Unlock the Full Potential of Your 3D Printing Investment with HP 3D Printing and Materialise! 🌟 In the rapidly evolving world of additive manufacturing, establishing a seamless digital thread is the key to maximizing your ROI. 🏆 🔗 What is a digital thread? It's a comprehensive data flow that includes: 📜 Order history 🧬 Material data 🛠️ Machine information 📊 Production metrics All this data feeds back into: 🧪 R&D 🔧 Continuous improvement 📈 Automated reporting 🔍 Audits 🔧 Why is this important? A well-established digital thread ensures: ⚙️ Optimized 3D printing workflows ♻️ Sustainable production practices 😊 Satisfied customers 💡 Why partner with us? We, together with our trusted partner Materialise, are your perfect partners to develop a holistic strategy for your additive manufacturing processes. Together, we can help you: ♻️ Replicate sustainable 3D printing workflows 🚀 Drive long-term business success 🔓 Unlock the true potential of your 3D printing capabilities 👉 Ready to transform your 3D printing investment? Partner with us today and take your additive manufacturing to the next level! 🌐 🔗 Find out more on how to plan, manage, and optimize your HP MJF and Metal Jet workflows with Materialise: https://lnkd.in/dyieA667 #3DPrinting #AdditiveManufacturing #DigitalThread #Innovation #Sustainability #BusinessSuccess #HP #Materialise #HP3DPrinting #3DbyHP #manufacturepossibilities #HPMultiJetFusion #HPMJF #HPMetalJet #additivemanufacturing #digitalmanufacturing #digitaltransformation

We’re kicking off RAPID + TCT with exciting product and partnership announcements that help you get even more out of your additive manufacturing production: ✅ Introducing advanced capabilities and an improved user experience in the latest version of Magics ✅ Integrating nTop’s implicit modeling API into Magics 3D Print Suite to accelerate the design-to-manufacturing process ✅ Enabling the inspection of EOS process data sources to detect anomalies with our Quality & Process Control system, eliminating the costly quality review of part post-manufacturing Read the full press release: https://mtls.am/4ckll03
